source.sqlReaderQuery:
with [BI_VW_Items_SerializedFleet_CTE] as  (SELECT
ITF.BoughtUsed
,ITF.[Qty]
,ItemQty.DDT
,ItemQty.Trans_Date
, ItemQty.TypeName
,CustomerType,[Customer Number],[Contract No],[Contract Date]
,ItemQty.[KEY]
,ItemQty.[TXTY]
,ItemQty.TransContract
, ItemQty.[OnRent]
, ItemQty.[OffRent]
, ItemQty.[IRO]
, ItemQty.[IMO]
, ItemQty.[ISO]
, iif(ITF.QTY - (ItemQty.[OnRent] + ItemQty.[OffRent] + ItemQty.[IRO]) is null, ITF.Qty, ITF.QTY - (ItemQty.[OnRent] + ItemQty.[OffRent] + ItemQty.[IRO])) AS [Ready]
, ITF.[KEY] AS [ItemKey]
, ITF.[Name] AS [ItemName]
, ITF.[Qty] AS [ItemQty]
, ITF.[QYOT] AS [QtyOut]
, ITF.[Type] AS [ItemType]
, ITF.[Num] AS [ItemNum]
, ITF.[CNTR] AS [ItemCntr]
, ITF.[PURP] AS [ItemPurp]
, ITF.[CurrentStore]
, ITF.[HomeStore]
, ITF.[Header] AS [ItemHeader]
, ITF.[ReplacementCost] AS [ItemReplaceCost]
, ITF.[BulkItem]
, ITF.[Inactive]
, ITF_h.[KEY] AS [HeaderKey]
, ITF_h.[Name] AS [HeaderName]
, ITF_h.[Num] AS [HeaderNum]
, ITF_h.[ReplacementCost] AS [HeaderReplaceCost]
, PF.[STORE_NAME] AS [CurrentStoreName]
, ITC.[Name] AS [CategoryName]
, ITF.[Category] AS [CategoryNumber]
, ITD.[DivisionName]
, ITC.[DivisionNumber] as [DivisionNumber]
, ITF_OEC.OEC AS [OEC]

FROM (((((ItemFile ITF
LEFT JOIN ItemFile AS ITF_h ON ITF.[Header] = ITF_h.[KEY])
LEFT JOIN ParameterFile PF ON ITF.[CurrentStore] = PF.[Store])
LEFT JOIN ItemCategory ITC ON ITF.[Category] = ITC.[Category])
LEFT JOIN ItemDivision ITD on ITC.[DivisionNumber] = ITD.[DivisionNumber])
LEFT JOIN (

SELECT  CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]
, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]
, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
,TI.[TXTY]
,TI.[ITEM],TI.DDT,T.[Date] as Trans_Date,ItemType.TypeDescrip as TypeName,CF.[KEY],T.CNTR AS TransContract,
--SUM(iif(Left(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' and (not(TI.[TXTY] In ('RR','RX')) or TI.[TXTY] = 'RH' and TI.[DDT] > getdate()),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OnRent,
SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' AND (NOT(TI.[TXTY] IN ('RR','RX','RH')) OR (TI.txty = 'RH' AND TI.DDT > GETDATE())) ,[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OnRent,
sum(iif(Left(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' and TI.[TXTY] = 'RH' and TI.[DDT] <= getdate(),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OffRent,
sum(iif(Left(TI.[CNTR],1)='r' and Not(TI.[TXTY] In ('RR','RX')),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS IRO,
sum(iif(Left(TI.[CNTR],1)='r' and TI.[TXTY] In ('RR','RX'),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS IMO,
sum(iif(cf.[KEY] LIKE 'REPAIRS-SERV%' and TI.SUBF = 1,TI.Qty,0)) AS ISO
FROM ((TransactionItems TI
INNER JOIN Transactions T ON TI.[CNTR] = T.[CNTR])
INNER JOIN ItemFile ITF ON TI.[Item] = ITF.[Num]
LEFT JOIN ItemType  ON ITF.TYPE = ItemType.Type)
INNER JOIN CustomerFile CF ON T.[CUSN] = CF.[CNUM]
WHERE Left(TI.[CNTR],1) Not In ('c','f','l','q','t','w') AND
Left(TI.[TXTY],1) = 'R' and
Left(T.[STAT],1) = 'O' and
ITF.Qty < 99000
GROUP BY TI.[ITEM],TI.DDT,ItemType.TypeDescrip,CF.[CNUM],T.CNTR,T.[Date], 
t.PYMT 
, cf.[Key]
, cf.[Name]
, t.[CNTR]
, t.[DATE] 
,TI.[TXTY]
) AS ItemQty ON ITF.[Num] = ItemQty.[Item])
LEFT JOIN (SELECT [ItemNumber] ,sum(([QuantityPurchased] - [QuantitySold]) * ([PriceEach] + [ExtraCharges])) AS OEC
FROM [ItemPurchaseDetail]
WHERE [Disposed] = 0
GROUP BY [ItemNumber]) AS ITF_OEC ON ITF.[NUM] = ITF_OEC.[ItemNumber]
WHERE not(ITF.[TYPE] in ('b','e','f','i','k','m','n','o','p','s','v','w'))
AND ITF.Qty < 90000)


-- select top 10 * from TransactionItems

, final as (
SELECT 
DDT,
Trans_Date,
itemkey
,ItemName
,CurrentStore
,CurrentStoreName
,CategoryName
,CASE WHEN left(TypeName,5) = 'Sales' then '' 
WHEN [KEY] like 'Repairs-Maint' then '  *In Maint'
WHEN trim(TransContract) = '' or (TransContract) IS NULL then '  Ready to Rent'
WHEN left(TransContract,1) = 'r' then '  *In Repair'
WHEN left(TransContract,1) = 't' then '  *In Transfer'
ELSE '  *On Rent' END AS [Status]


,sum(OEC) as OEC
,sum(OnRent) as OnRent
, SUM(Ready * OEC) AS [AvailableOEC]
, SUM(IRO * OEC) AS [InRepairOEC]
, SUM(OffRent * OEC) AS [OffRentOEC]
, SUM(OnRent * OEC) AS [OnRentOEC]
, SUM(ItemQty * OEC) AS [TotalQtyOEC]
, SUM(Ready) AS [AvailableQty]
, SUM(IRO) AS [InRepairQty]
, SUM(OffRent) AS [OffRentQty]
, SUM(OnRent) AS [OnRentQty]
, SUM(ItemQty) AS TotalItemQty
,sum( case when VW.BoughtUsed = 0 then (Ready * OEC) else 0 end ) as New_Equipment
,sum( case when VW.BoughtUsed = 1 then (Ready * OEC) else 0 end ) as Used_Equipment
--,getdate()
, switchoffset(sysdatetimeoffset(),'-05:00') AS [Snapshot_Date]
,CustomerType,[Customer Number],[Contract No],[Contract Date]
,[TXTY]
FROM
[BI_VW_Items_SerializedFleet_CTE] AS VW 
LEFT OUTER JOIN [ItemFile_TR] AS ITF_TR ON VW.[ItemNum] = ITF_TR.[NUM] AND ITF_TR.[Inactive] = 0
LEFT OUTER JOIN [ItemCategory_TR] ITC_TR ON VW.[CategoryNumber] = ITC_TR.[Category] AND ITC_TR.[Inactive] = 0 
LEFT OUTER JOIN [ItemDivision_TR] ITD_TR on VW.[DivisionNumber] = ITD_TR.[DivisionNumber] AND ITD_TR.[Inactive] = 0 
WHERE
VW.[Inactive] = 0 AND VW.[BulkItem] = 0
--and CurrentStore=106
group by DDT,itemkey,Trans_Date
,ItemName
,CurrentStore
,CurrentStoreName
,CategoryName,CustomerType,[Customer Number],[Contract No],[Contract Date]
,CASE WHEN left(TypeName,5) = 'Sales' then '' 
WHEN [KEY] like 'Repairs-Maint' then '  *In Maint'
WHEN trim(TransContract) = '' or (TransContract) IS NULL then '  Ready to Rent'
WHEN left(TransContract,1) = 'r' then '  *In Repair'
WHEN left(TransContract,1) = 't' then '  *In Transfer'
ELSE '  *On Rent' END
,[TXTY]
)

select  * from final

sink.preCopyScript: delete from [POR].[Executive_Dashboard_Stage] where snapshot_date = cast(switchoffset(sysdatetimeoffset(),'-05:00') as date);

source.sqlReaderQuery:
--USED Equipment
SELECT
  saf.Store
, CAST(saf.DATE AS DATE) AS [Date]
, CAST(ABS(ti.PRIC - ti.DiscountAmount)*ti.QTY AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS UsedEquipmentRevenue
, CAST(ABS(saf.PurchaseCost - saf.Depreciation)*ti.QTY AS DECIMAL(18,3)) AS UsedEquipmentCost
, NULL AS NewEquipmentRevenue
, NULL AS NewEquipmentCost
, CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]
, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]
, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
, ti.[TXTY]
, ifi.[Name] AS ItemName
, ifi.[Key] As [ItemKey]
, ifi.MANF As [Make]
, ifi.MODN As [Model]
, ifi.ModelYear
, ic.[Name] AS CategoryName

FROM POR.dbo.SoldAssetFile saf
JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions t ON t.CNTR = saf.CNTR
JOIN POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti ON ti.CNTR = saf.CNTR AND saf.ItemNo = ti.ITEM
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.[NUM] = ti.ITEM
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemCategory ic ON ic.Category = ifi.Category
JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerFile cf ON cf.CNUM = saf.CustNo
WHERE ti.TXTY = 'SA'
AND ti.QTY <> 0

UNION ALL

--NEW Equipment
SELECT
  tca.Store
, CAST(tca.Date AS DATE) AS [Date]
, NULL AS UsedEquipmentRevenue
, NULL AS UsedEquipmentCost
, CAST(ABS((ti.PRIC - ti.DiscountAmount))*ti.QTY AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS NewEquipmentRevenue
, CAST(ABS((ipd.PriceEach + ipd.ExtraCharges))*ti.QTY AS DECIMAL(18,3)) AS NewEquipmentCost
, CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]
, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]
, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
, TI.[TXTY]
, ifi.[Name] AS ItemName
, ifi.[Key] As [ItemKey]
, ifi.MANF As [Make]
, ifi.MODN As [Model]
, ifi.ModelYear
, ic.[Name] AS CategoryName

FROM POR.dbo.TotalsContractsAccrual tca
JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions t ON t.CNTR = tca.CNTR
JOIN POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti ON ti.CNTR = tca.CNTR
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.[NUM] = ti.ITEM
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemCategory ic ON ic.Category = ifi.Category
JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerFile cf ON cf.CNUM = tca.Cusn
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemPurchaseDetail ipd ON ipd.[ItemNumber] = ifi.NUM AND ipd.QuantitySold >0
WHERE ti.TXTY = 'SS'
AND ifi.Asset=0
AND (ifi.SerialNumber <> '')
AND (tca.SaleTx <> 0 OR tca.SaleNT <> 0)
AND ti.QTY <> 0

WITH v_CTE AS (

SELECT store,sum([TCA].[RentTX] + [TCA].[RentNT]) AS Rent,

       sum([TCA].[SaleTX] + [TCA].[SaleNT] - ISNULL(dp.DelPUamt,0)) AS Sale,  --subtract out Delivery/PU type 4 transactionitems

tca.[Date] AS PostedDate, sum(dp.Purchase_Price) as Purchase_Price, sum(dp.Current_Book_Price) as Current_Book_Price, dp.CustomerType, dp.[Customer Number],
dp.[Contract No], dp.[Contract Date],dp.[TXTY]

FROM POR.dbo.TotalsContractsAccrual tca

LEFT JOIN (

       SELECT ti.CNTR, SUM(ti.PRIC) AS DelPUamt, SUM(ifi.PURP) as Purchase_Price, 
	   SUM(ifi.CURV) as Current_Book_Price,CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]
, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]
, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
,TI.[TXTY]

       FROM POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti
	   JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions t ON ti.CNTR = t.CNTR
       INNER JOIN CustomerFile CF ON T.[CUSN] = CF.[CNUM]
       JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.NUM = ti.ITEM

       WHERE (ifi.Category = 4 --Delivery/PU

         OR (ifi.SerialNumber <> '' AND ifi.Asset = 0))  --non-asset with serialnumber <-- ******** Not sure this works, see CNTR 103027A ** NEED TO ASK MICHAEL

                      --Select * from POR.dbo.Itemfile where [key] = '6965'

                       --SELECT * from POR.dbo.Itemfile where SerialNumber <> '' AND Asset = 0  <-- these 47 just might be marked incorrectly

          GROUP BY ti.CNTR,CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END 
, cf.[CNUM]
, cf.[Name]
, t.[CNTR]
, t.[DATE] 
,TI.[TXTY]

) dp ON dp.CNTR = tca.CNTR

group by store, tca.Date, dp.CustomerType, dp.[Customer Number],
dp.[Contract No], dp.[Contract Date],dp.[TXTY]

)

SELECT store,SUM(Rent) AS RentSum, SUM(Sale) AS SaleSum, 
cast(PostedDate as date) as Posted_Date,isnull(sum(Purchase_Price),0) as Purchase_Price,
isnull(sum(Current_Book_Price),0) as Current_Book_Price,CustomerType, [Customer Number],
[Contract No], [Contract Date],[TXTY]

FROM v_CTE
group by store,PostedDate,CustomerType, [Customer Number],
[Contract No], [Contract Date],[TXTY]

SELECT SoldItems.Batch,SoldItems.[Date], SoldItems.CNTR, SoldItems.ItemNo, SoldItems.CustNo, SoldItems.Amount, SoldItems.Qty, SoldItems.[Name], SoldItems.PurchaseCost,

       SoldItems.Depreciation, SoldItems.PurchaseDate, SoldItems.Store, SoldItems.Asset, SoldItems.Header, SoldItems.CustomerName,

          SoldItems.[KEY],

           iif(ItemTL.ItemName is Null, SoldItems.ItemName,ItemTL.ItemName) as ItemName,
		   SoldItems.BoughtUsed,


           SoldItems.ItemQty, SoldItems.PartNumber, SoldItems.ItemNum, SoldItems.MANF, SoldItems.MODN,

          iif(ItemTL.UserDefined1 is Null, SoldItems.UserDefined1,ItemTL.UserDefined1) as UserDefined1,

          SoldItems.INC3, SoldItems.REPC2, SoldItems.GLAccount, SoldItems.HomeStore, SoldItems.CurrentStore, SoldItems.SerialNumber,

         iif(CatTL.CatName is Null,SoldItems.CategoryName,CatTL.CatName) as CategoryName,

          SoldItems.AssetGL,

          iif(DivTL.DivisionName is Null, SoldItems.DivisionName,DivTL.DivisionName) as DivisionName,

           SoldItems.NoPrintItemNo,

          SoldItems.GLEquip, SoldItems.Category, SoldItems.DivisionNumber,
		 -- getdate() 
		  switchoffset(sysdatetimeoffset(),'-05:00')  as Snapshot_Date, 
		  SoldItems.CustomerType, SoldItems.[Contract Date], SoldItems.[TXTY]

from (

 

SELECT SA.Batch,SA.[Date], SA.CNTR, SA.ItemNo,ITF.BoughtUsed ,SA.CustNo, SA.Amount, SA.Qty, SA.[Name], SA.PurchaseCost,

       SA.Depreciation, SA.PurchaseDate, SA.Store, SA.Asset, ITF.Header, CF.[Name] AS CustomerName,

          ITF.[KEY], ITF.[Name] as ItemName, ITF.QTY as ItemQty, ITF.PartNumber, ITF.NUM as ItemNum, ITF.MANF, ITF.MODN,

          ITF.UserDefined1, ITF.INC3, ITF.REPC2, ITF.GLAccount, ITF.HomeStore, ITF.CurrentStore, ITF.SerialNumber,

          CAT.[Name] as CategoryName, CAT.AssetGL, ID.DivisionName, PF.NoPrintItemNo,

          AC.Equipment as GLEquip, ITF.Category, ID.DivisionNumber, CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
,TI.[TXTY]

         

 

FROM SoldAssetFile SA

      LEFT JOIN ItemFile ITF ON SA.ItemNo = ITF.NUM

         LEFT JOIN ItemCategory CAT ON ITF.Category = CAT.Category 

         LEFT JOIN ItemDivision ID ON CAT.DivisionNumber = ID.DivisionNumber

      LEFT JOIN CustomerFile CF ON SA.CustNo = CF.CNUM
	  JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions t ON CF.CNUM = t.CUSN
	  join POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti on t.CNTR = ti.CNTR

         LEFT JOIN ParameterFile PF ON ITF.HomeStore = PF.[Store]

         LEFT JOIN AccountNumbers AC ON SA.Store = AC.Store  ) as SoldItems

 

--WHERE Batch >={?BegBatch} and

--      Batch <= {?EndBatch} and

--      ('{?CustNo}' = '*' OR SA.CustNo = '{?CustNo}')  AND

--      ('{?Header}' = '*' OR ITF.Header = '{?Header}' ) AND

--      ('{?ItemNo}' = '*' OR SA.ItemNo = '{?ItemNo}')

--

--) as SoldItems

 

Left Join

 

(SELECT TL.[NUM], TL.[Name] as ItemName, TL.INST, TL.Style1 , TL.Style2, TL.Style3 , TL.WebLink ,TL.VehicleType ,

TL.[DescriptionLong],TL.WebGroup , TL.[Group] as ItemGroup,TL.[LOOKUP]  ,TL.[UserDefined1] , TL.[UserDefined2]

FROM TranslationNames TN 

LEFT JOIN ItemFile_Tr TL on TN.LanguageCode = TL.Languagecode

--WHERE TN.LanguageCode IS NULL OR TN.LanguageCode = '{?LanguageCode}'

) AS ItemTL ON SoldItems.ItemNum = ItemTL.Num

Left Join

 

(SELECT TL.Category,  TL.[Name] as CatName,TL.WebTags, TL.Style1 as CatStyle1 ,TL.Style2 as CatStyle2, TL.Style3 as CatStyle3 

FROM TranslationNames TN

LEFT JOIN ItemCategory_Tr TL ON TN.LanguageCode  = TL.Languagecode 

--WHERE TN.LanguageCode IS NULL OR TN.LanguageCode = '{?LanguageCode}' 

) AS CatTL ON SoldItems.Category = CatTL.Category

Left Join

 

(  SELECT  TL.DivisionNumber,  TL.DivisionName   

FROM TranslationNames TN  

LEFT JOIN ItemDivision_Tr TL ON TN.LanguageCode  = TL.Languagecode

--WHERE TN.LanguageCode IS NULL OR TN.LanguageCode = '{?LanguageCode}'

) AS DivTL ON SoldItems.DivisionNumber = DivTL.DivisionNumber

SELECT 

--Below are Transaction Level Items

  CASE WHEN pf.Store <> '001' THEN RIGHT(pf.STORE_NAME, LEN(pf.STORE_NAME) - 4) ELSE pf.STORE_NAME END AS [Store Name]

, t.[STR] AS [Store No]

, CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType

, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]

, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]

, t.JOBN AS [Job Name]

, t.JBPO AS [Job PO#] 

, t.JBID AS [Job #]

, cjs.Description AS [Job Site Name]

, ISNULL(cjs.SiteAddress,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(cjs.SiteCity,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(cjs.SiteZip,'') AS [Job Site Address]

, t.DMG AS [Extended Protection Plan]

, s.[Name] AS [Contract Salesman]

, s2.[Name] AS [Customer Salesman]

, o.OPNM AS [Created by Operator Name]

, o2.OPNM AS [Assigned to Operator Name]

, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]

, t1.OriginalContractDate AS [Original Contract Date]

, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]

--Below are Item level details

, CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'R' THEN 'RENT'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RR' THEN 'Returned'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RX' THEN 'Previously Returned'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RH' THEN 'Not Returned. Item on hold for pickup'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RD' THEN 'Not Returned. Demand letter sent'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RM' THEN 'Not Returned. Reservation Reminder letter sent'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RN' THEN 'Not Returned. Reminder letter sent'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = 'RV' THEN 'Not Returned. Reservation Verify letter sent'

       WHEN ti.TXTY = '' THEN 'Not Returned. No letters have been sent'

ELSE 'Sale Item' END AS [Item Status]

, ifi.Header 

, ti.ITEM AS [Key] 

, ifi.Name

, ifi.SerialNumber AS [Serial Number]

, ifi.MANF AS [Make]

, ifi.MODN AS [Model]

, ifi.Modelyear AS [Model Year]

, ti.PRIC AS [Amount Charged]

, ti.DailyAmount AS [Daily]

, ifi.RATE1 AS [Book Rate Daily]

, ti.WeeklyAmount AS [Weekly]

, ifi.RATE2 AS [Book Rate Weekly]

, ti.MonthlyAmount AS [Monthly]

, ifi.RATE3 AS [Book Rate Monthly]

, CASE WHEN ti.Substatus = 7 THEN 'Substitute' ELSE '' END AS [Is Substitute]

, CASE WHEN ti.Substatus = 7 THEN ti.Comments ELSE '' END AS [Substitution Comments]
--,getdate() 
,switchoffset(sysdatetimeoffset(),'-05:00')  Report_Refresh_Date


 

FROM POR.dbo.transactions t

JOIN POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti ON ti.CNTR = t.CNTR

JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.NUM = ti.ITEM

JOIN POR.dbo.ParameterFile pf ON pf.Store = t.[STR]

JOIN (SELECT t0.CNTR, t0.[DATE] AS OriginalContractDate FROM POR.dbo.Transactions t0 WHERE RIGHT(t0.CNTR,1) NOT LIKE '[A-Za-z]%') t1

              ON t1.CNTR = CASE WHEN RIGHT(t.CNTR,1) LIKE '[A-Za-z]%' THEN LEFT(t.CNTR, LEN(t.CNTR)-1) ELSE t.CNTR END

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ItemComments ic ON ic.NUM = ifi.NUM

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerFile cf ON cf.CNUM = t.CUSN

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerJobSite cjs ON cjs.Number = t.JobSite

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.Salesman s ON s.Number = t.Salesman

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.Salesman s2 ON s2.Number = cf.Salesman

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.OperatorId o ON o.OPNO = t.OperatorCreated

LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.OperatorId o2 ON o2.OPNO = t.OperatorAssigned

 

WHERE LEFT(t.STAT,1) = 'O'

AND LEFT(t.CNTR,1) NOT IN ('q','r','s','t')

AND (ifi.TYPE IN ('T','H','U','V','A','L','R','N','K','D') -- Include Rental types & delivery/pickup charges only; exclude sales, diesel, etc.

OR ifi.Name LIKE 'Delivery%' --2. Sale items to include

OR ifi.Name LIKE 'Pickup%' --3. Sale items to include

)

AND t.STAT NOT IN ('OJ','OH','RR','OR')

AND ti.TXTY <> 'RR'

ORDER BY [Store Name], cf.[NAME], t.[DATE] ASC, t.CNTR, s.[Name]

WITH v_CTE AS (

SELECT store,sum([TCA].[RentTX] + [TCA].[RentNT]) AS Rent,

       sum([TCA].[SaleTX] + [TCA].[SaleNT] - ISNULL(dp.DelPUamt,0)) AS Sale,  --subtract out Delivery/PU type 4 transactionitems

tca.[Date] AS PostedDate, sum(dp.Purchase_Price) as Purchase_Price, sum(dp.Current_Book_Price) as Current_Book_Price, dp.CustomerType, dp.[Customer Number],
dp.[Contract No], dp.[Contract Date],dp.[TXTY],dp.ItemKey,dp.ItemName,dp.Make,dp.Model,dp.ModelYear,dp.categoryname

FROM POR.dbo.TotalsContractsAccrual tca

LEFT JOIN (

       SELECT ti.CNTR, SUM(ti.PRIC) AS DelPUamt, SUM(ifi.PURP) as Purchase_Price, 
	   SUM(ifi.CURV) as Current_Book_Price,CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]
, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]
, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
,TI.[TXTY],ifi.[Name] ItemName,ifi.[Key] As [ItemKey],ifi.MANF As [Make],
ifi.MODN As [Model],
ifi.ModelYear,ic.[Name] categoryname
       FROM POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti
	   JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions t ON ti.CNTR = t.CNTR
       INNER JOIN CustomerFile CF ON T.[CUSN] = CF.[CNUM]
       JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.NUM = ti.ITEM
	   JOIN POR.dbo.ItemCategory ic ON ifi.Category = ic.Category
       WHERE (ifi.Category = 4 --Delivery/PU

         OR (ifi.SerialNumber <> '' AND ifi.Asset = 0))  --non-asset with serialnumber <-- ******** Not sure this works, see CNTR 103027A ** NEED TO ASK MICHAEL

                      --Select * from POR.dbo.Itemfile where [key] = '6965'

                       --SELECT * from POR.dbo.Itemfile where SerialNumber <> '' AND Asset = 0  <-- these 47 just might be marked incorrectly

          GROUP BY ti.CNTR,CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END 
, cf.[CNUM]
, cf.[Name]
, t.[CNTR]
, t.[DATE] 
,TI.[TXTY],ifi.[Name] ,ifi.[Key] ,ifi.MANF ,ic.[Name],
ifi.MODN ,ifi.ModelYear

) dp ON dp.CNTR = tca.CNTR

group by store, tca.Date, dp.CustomerType, dp.[Customer Number],
dp.[Contract No], dp.[Contract Date],dp.[TXTY],dp.ItemKey,dp.ItemName,dp.Make,dp.Model,dp.ModelYear,dp.categoryname

)

SELECT store,SUM(Rent) AS RentSum, SUM(Sale) AS SaleSum, 
cast(PostedDate as date) as Posted_Date,isnull(sum(Purchase_Price),0) as Purchase_Price,
isnull(sum(Current_Book_Price),0) as Current_Book_Price,CustomerType, [Customer Number],
[Contract No], [Contract Date],[TXTY],ItemKey,ItemName,Make,Model,ModelYear,categoryname

FROM v_CTE
group by store,PostedDate,CustomerType, [Customer Number],
[Contract No], [Contract Date],[TXTY],ItemKey,ItemName,Make,Model,ModelYear,categoryname



--select * from [POR]..[ItemCategory]

SELECT 
store,cast(tca.[date] as date) as date,
  ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'SA' AND ifi.Asset = 1 AND (tca.AssetTx <> 0 OR tca.AssetNT <> 0) THEN ti.PRIC  END), '')
  AS UsedEquipmentRevenue,
  --   ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'SA' AND ifi.Asset = 1 AND (tca.AssetTx <> 0 OR tca.AssetNT <> 0) THEN ifi.PURP  END), '')
  --AS UsedEquipmentCost

   ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'SA' AND ifi.Asset = 1 AND (tca.AssetTx <> 0 OR tca.AssetNT <> 0) THEN ipd.PriceEach+ipd.ExtraCharges  END), '')
  AS UsedEquipmentCost
  ,
  ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'SS' AND 
ifi.Asset = 0 AND ifi.SerialNumber <> '' AND (tca.SaleTx <> 0 OR tca.SaleNT <> 0) THEN ti.PRIC  END), '')
AS NewEquipmentRevenue,

-- ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'SS' AND 
--ifi.Asset = 0 AND ifi.SerialNumber <> '' AND (tca.SaleTx <> 0 OR tca.SaleNT <> 0) THEN ifi.PURP  END), '')
--AS NewEquipmentCost,

 ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN ti.TXTY = 'SS' AND 
ifi.Asset = 0 AND ifi.SerialNumber <> '' AND (tca.SaleTx <> 0 OR tca.SaleNT <> 0) THEN ipd.PriceEach+ipd.ExtraCharges  END), '')
AS NewEquipmentCost,

sum(ifi.purp) as Purchase_Price, sum(ifi.curv) as Current_Book_Price
,CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, cf.[CNUM] AS [Customer Number]
, cf.[Name] AS [Customer Name]
, t.[CNTR] AS [Contract No]
, t.[DATE] AS [Contract Date]
,TI.[TXTY]
, ifi.[Name] ItemName,ifi.[Key] As [ItemKey],ifi.MANF As [Make],
ifi.MODN As [Model],
ifi.ModelYear,ic.[Name] categoryname
FROM POR.dbo.TotalsContractsAccrual tca
JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions t ON t.CNTR = tca.CNTR
JOIN POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti ON ti.CNTR = t.CNTR
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.NUM = ti.ITEM
INNER JOIN por.dbo.CustomerFile CF ON T.[CUSN] = CF.[CNUM]
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemCategory ic ON ifi.Category = ic.Category
JOIN POR.dbo.ItemPurchaseDetail ipd ON ipd.[ItemNumber] = ifi.NUM
group by store,cast(tca.[date] as date)  
,CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END 
, cf.[CNUM]
, cf.[Name]
, t.[CNTR]
, t.[DATE] 
,TI.[TXTY],ifi.[Name] ,ifi.[Key] ,ifi.MANF ,ic.[Name],
ifi.MODN ,ifi.ModelYear

activities.name: EXECUTIVE_DASHBOARD_STAGE_SUMMARY
activities.description:
match POR system dashboard.  
use view query behind widget.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
  a.ItemKey
, a.ItemNum
, a.ItemName
, a.ItemType
, a.Asset
, a.ItemQty
, a.QtyOut
, a.OnRentQty
, a.OffRentQty
, a.CalledOffRentQty
, a.PickUpOffRentQty
, a.IROQty
, a.IMOQty
, a.ISOQty
, IIF(a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty) IS NULL, a.ItemQty, a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty)) AS [AvailableQty]
, a.ItemCntr
, a.ItemPurp
, a.HomeStore
, a.CurrentStore
, a.CurrentStoreName
, a.ItemHeader
, a.ItemReplaceCost
, a.BulkItem
, a.Inactive
, a.BoughtUsed
, a.HeaderKey
, a.HeaderName
, a.HeaderNum
, a.HeaderReplaceCost
, a.CategoryNumber
, a.CategoryName
, a.OEC
, SUM(a.ItemQty * a.OEC) AS [TotalOEC]
, SUM(a.OnRentQty * a.OEC) AS [TotalOnRentOEC]
, SUM(a.OffRentQty * a.OEC) AS [TotalOffRentOEC]
, SUM(a.CalledOffRentQty * a.OEC) AS [TotalOffRentOECCalledOff]
, SUM(a.PickUpOffRentQty * a.OEC) AS [TotalOffRentOECPickUp]
--Inspect = TotalNotAvailable - (TotalOffRentOEC + TotalInRepair)
, (SUM(a.ItemQty * a.OEC) - (SUM(a.OnRentQty * a.OEC) + (SUM((IIF(a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty) IS NULL, a.ItemQty, a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty))) * a.OEC)))
		- ((SUM(a.OffRentQty * OEC)) + (SUM(a.IROQty * a.OEC)))) AS [TotalInspectOEC]
--TotalNotAvailableOEC = TotalOEC - (TotalOnRentOEC + TotalAvailableOEC)
, ((SUM(a.ItemQty * a.OEC)) - ((SUM(a.OnRentQty * a.OEC)) + (SUM((IIF(a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty) IS NULL, a.ItemQty, a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty))) * a.OEC)))) AS [TotalNotAvailableOEC]
, SUM((IIF(a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty) IS NULL, a.ItemQty, a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty))) * a.OEC) AS [TotalAvailableOEC]
, SUM(a.IROQty * a.OEC) AS [TotalInRepairOEC]
, a.Snapshot_Date
FROM (
SELECT
        ITF.[KEY] AS ItemKey
	  , ITF.[Num] AS ItemNum
      , ITF.[Name] AS ItemName
	  , ITF.[Type] AS ItemType
	  , ITF.Asset      
      , ITF.[Qty] AS ItemQty
      , ITF.[QYOT] AS QtyOut
	  --Adjusted quantities in case of multiple out asset issue:
	  --OnRent
	  , CASE WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OnRent]>0 THEN 1
		WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OnRent]=0 THEN 0
		ELSE ItemQty.[OnRent] END AS [OnRentQty]
	  --OffRent
	  , CASE WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OnRent]>0 THEN 0
		WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OffRent]>0 THEN 1
		ELSE ItemQty.[OffRent] END AS [OffRentQty]
	  --CalledOff
	  , CASE WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OnRent]>0 THEN 0
		WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.OffRentCalledOffQty>0 THEN 1
		ELSE ItemQty.OffRentCalledOffQty END AS [CalledOffRentQty]
	  --PickUp
	  , CASE WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OnRent]>0 THEN 0
		WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.OffRentPickUpQty>0 THEN 1
		ELSE ItemQty.OffRentPickUpQty END AS [PickUpOffRentQty]
	  --IRO
	  , CASE WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND ItemQty.[OnRent]=0 AND ItemQty.[OffRent]=0 THEN 1
		WHEN ITF.Asset=1 AND ITF.[QYOT]>1 AND (ItemQty.[OnRent]=1 OR ItemQty.[OffRent]=1) THEN 0
		ELSE ItemQty.[IRO] END AS [IROQty]
      , ItemQty.[IMO] AS [IMOQty]
      , ItemQty.[ISO] AS [ISOQty]
	  , ItemQty.OffRentCalledOffQty
	  , ItemQty.OffRentPickUpQty
      , ITF.[CNTR] AS ItemCntr
      , ITF.[PURP] AS ItemPurp
	  , ITF.[HomeStore]
      , ITF.[CurrentStore]
	  , PF.[STORE_NAME] AS CurrentStoreName      
      , ITF.[Header] AS ItemHeader
      , ITF.[ReplacementCost] AS ItemReplaceCost
      , ITF.[BulkItem]
      , ITF.[Inactive]
	  , ITF.BoughtUsed
      , ITF_h.[KEY] AS HeaderKey
      , ITF_h.[Name] AS HeaderName
      , ITF_h.[Num] AS HeaderNum
      , ITF_h.[ReplacementCost] AS HeaderReplaceCost
      , ITF.[Category] AS CategoryNumber
      , ITC.[Name] AS CategoryName
      , ITF_OEC.OEC AS OEC
      --, GETDATE() 
	  ,switchoffset(sysdatetimeoffset(),'-05:00') AS [Snapshot_Date]

FROM (((((POR.dbo.ItemFile ITF
    LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile AS ITF_h ON ITF.[Header] = ITF_h.[KEY])
    LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ParameterFile PF ON ITF.[CurrentStore] = PF.[Store])
    LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ItemCategory ITC ON ITF.[Category] = ITC.[Category])
    LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ItemDivision ITD ON ITC.[DivisionNumber] = ITD.[DivisionNumber])
    LEFT JOIN (SELECT TI.[ITEM],

                      SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' AND (NOT(TI.[TXTY] IN ('RR','RX','RH')) OR (TI.txty = 'RH' AND TI.DDT > GETDATE())) ,[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OnRent,
                      SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' AND TI.[TXTY] = 'RH' AND TI.[DDT] <= GETDATE(),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OffRent,
					  SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' AND TI.[TXTY] = 'RH' AND TI.[DDT] <= GETDATE() AND T.Pickup=0,[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OffRentCalledOffQty,
					  SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)<>'r' AND TI.[TXTY] = 'RH' AND TI.[DDT] <= GETDATE() AND T.Pickup=1,[TI].[Qty],0)) AS OffRentPickUpQty,
                      SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)='r' AND NOT(TI.[TXTY] IN ('RR','RX')),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS IRO,
                      SUM(IIF(LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1)='r' AND TI.[TXTY] IN ('RR','RX'),[TI].[Qty],0)) AS IMO,
                      SUM(IIF(cf.[KEY] LIKE 'REPAIRS-SERV%' AND TI.SUBF = 1,TI.Qty,0)) AS ISO
               FROM ((POR.dbo.TransactionItems TI
                      INNER JOIN POR.dbo.Transactions T ON TI.[CNTR] = T.[CNTR])
                      INNER JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ITF ON TI.[Item] = ITF.[Num])
                      INNER JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerFile CF ON T.[CUSN] = CF.[CNUM]
               WHERE LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1) <> 'c' AND
                     LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1) <> 'f' AND
                     LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1) <> 'l' AND
                     LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1) <> 'q' AND
                     LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1) <> 't' AND
                     LEFT(TI.[CNTR],1) <> 'w' AND
                     LEFT(TI.[TXTY],1) = 'R' AND
                     LEFT(T.[STAT],1) = 'O' AND
                     ITF.Qty < 99000
               GROUP BY TI.[Item]
                      ) AS ItemQty ON ITF.[Num] = ItemQty.[Item])
					  
    LEFT JOIN (SELECT [ItemNumber] ,SUM(([QuantityPurchased] - [QuantitySold]) * ([PriceEach] + [ExtraCharges])) AS OEC
               FROM POR.dbo.[ItemPurchaseDetail]
               WHERE [Disposed] = 0
               GROUP BY [ItemNumber]) AS ITF_OEC ON ITF.[NUM] = ITF_OEC.[ItemNumber]
WHERE
   ITF.[Type] <> 'b' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'e' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'f' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'i' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'k' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'm' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'n' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'o' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'p' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 's' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'v' AND
   ITF.[Type] <> 'w' AND
   ITF.Qty < 90000
   AND ITF.Inactive = 0 AND ITF.BulkItem = 0
	  ) a
GROUP BY
  a.ItemKey
, a.ItemNum
, a.ItemName
, a.ItemType
, a.Asset
, a.ItemQty
, a.QtyOut
, a.OnRentQty
, a.OffRentQty
, a.CalledOffRentQty
, a.PickUpOffRentQty
, a.IROQty
, a.IMOQty
, a.ISOQty
, IIF(a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty) IS NULL, a.ItemQty, a.ItemQty - (a.OnRentQty + a.OffRentQty + a.IROQty))
, a.ItemCntr
, a.ItemPurp
, a.HomeStore
, a.CurrentStore
, a.CurrentStoreName
, a.ItemHeader
, a.ItemReplaceCost
, a.BulkItem
, a.Inactive
, a.BoughtUsed
, a.HeaderKey
, a.HeaderName
, a.HeaderNum
, a.HeaderReplaceCost
, a.CategoryNumber
, a.CategoryName
, a.OEC
, a.Snapshot_Date;

sink.preCopyScript: delete from [POR].[Executive_Dashboard_Stage_Summary] where snapshot_date = cast(switchoffset(sysdatetimeoffset(),'-05:00') as date);

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT t.CNTR, t.STAT AS CNTRStatus, FORMAT(t.[DATE],N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS CNTRStartDate, FORMAT(t1.OriginalContractDate,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS OriginalCNTRStartDate--, FORMAT(t.CLDT,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS CNTRClosedDate_delete
, CASE WHEN t.CONT = '' THEN FORMAT(t.CLDT,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') WHEN t.CLDT IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE FORMAT(ti.DDT,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') END AS CNTRClosedDate
, FORMAT(t.DeliveryDate,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS DeliveryDate_sys, FORMAT(t.PickupDate,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS ScheduledPickupDate_sys, FORMAT(ti.DDT,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS [EstItemDueDate_sysDDT] 
, FORMAT(t.Billed,N'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS InvoiceDate_sys

, IIF(ISDATE(CASE WHEN ti.Comments LIKE '%Called Off #%on%' THEN SUBSTRING(LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('on ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))),0,CHARINDEX(' ',LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('on ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))))) ELSE NULL END)=1,CASE WHEN ti.Comments LIKE '%Called Off #%on%' THEN SUBSTRING(LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('on ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))),0,CHARINDEX(' ',LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('on ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))))) ELSE NULL END,NULL) AS CalledOffOnDate
, IIF(ISDATE(CASE WHEN ti.Comments LIKE '%Called Off #%for%' THEN 
RTRIM(SUBSTRING(LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('for ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))),0,PATINDEX('%/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%',LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('for ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))))+5))
ELSE NULL END)=1,CASE WHEN ti.Comments LIKE '%Called Off #%for%' THEN 
RTRIM(SUBSTRING(LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('for ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))),0,PATINDEX('%/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]%',LTRIM(SUBSTRING(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy')))), CHARINDEX('for ',RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))) + 3, LEN(RIGHT(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'),CHARINDEX('#',REVERSE(REPLACE(ti.Comments,'PO#','yyy'))))))))+5))
ELSE NULL END,NULL) AS CalledOffForDate

, IIF(ti.TXTY = 'RH' AND ti.[DDT] <= GETDATE() AND t.Pickup = 0, 1, 0) AS IsInCalledOffStatus
, IIF(ti.TXTY = 'RH' AND TI.[DDT] <= GETDATE() AND t.Pickup = 1, 1, 0) AS IsInPickupStatus

, IIF(t.CONT = '', 0,1) AS IsCycleBill
, IIF(LEFT(t.STAT,1)='O',1,0) IsOpenStatusCNTR
, IIF(LEFT(t.STAT,1)='C' OR (LEFT(t.STAT,1)<>'O' AND t.CLDT IS NOT NULL),1,0) AS IsClosedCNTR
, IIF(LEFT(ti.TXTY,1)='R',1,0) AS IsRentalItems
, IIF(ISNUMERIC(LEFT(t.CNTR,1))=1,1,0) AS IsNonPrefixedCNTR
, IIF(ti.ITEM IS NULL,1,0) AS IsItemlessCNTR

, t.[STR] AS Branch, pf.STORE_NAME AS StoreName
, ti.Comments
, ti.TXTY, ifi.[TYPE]
, ic.Category AS CategoryNumber
, ic.[Name] AS Category
, ifi.Header
, ifi.[KEY]
, ifi.NUM
, ifi.[Name]
, ti.[Desc]
, ifi.SerialNumber AS SerialNumber
, ifi.MANF AS Make
, ifi.MODN AS Model
, ifi.Modelyear AS ModelYear
, ifi.QTY AS ItemQty
, ti.QTY AS CNTRQty
, ti.PRIC AS AmountCharged
, ti.DiscountAmount
, t.DMG AS ExtendedProtectionPlan
, ti.DailyAmount
, ifi.RATE1 AS BookRateDaily
, ti.WeeklyAmount
, ifi.RATE2 AS BookRateWeekly
, ti.MonthlyAmount
, ifi.RATE3 AS BookRateMonthly
, ifi.PURP AS [SP_PURP]
, ifi.ExtraCharges AS SP_ExtraCharges
, oec.OEC
, oec.[BriggsPURP_PlusExtraCharges]
, ifi.BulkItem AS IsBulkItem
, ifi.Inactive AS IsInactive
, ifi.Asset AS IsAsset
, IIF((ifi.[TYPE] NOT IN ('b','e','f','i','k','m','n','o','p','s','v','w') AND (ifi.Inactive=0 AND ifi.BulkItem=0 AND ifi.QTY<90000)),1,0) AS IsMatchSummaryTableItems --Match Executive_Dashboard_Stage_Summary items
, CASE WHEN ti.Substatus = 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsSubstitute
, t.Delvr AS IsDeliveryRequired
, cf.APILink AS NSCustomerNumber
, cf.[CNUM] AS CustomerNumber
, cf.[Name] AS CustomerName
, CASE WHEN t.PYMT = 'E' THEN 'Account' ELSE 'Cash' END AS CustomerType
, pm.PayType
, t.JOBN
, t.JBPO
, t.JBID
, cjs.[Description] AS JobSiteName
, t.DeliverToCompany
, COALESCE(NULLIF(cjs.SiteAddress,''), NULLIF(t.DeliveryAddress,''), NULLIF(pf.STORE_STRT,'')) AS DeliveryStreetAddress
, COALESCE(NULLIF(LEFT(cjs.SiteCity, CHARINDEX(',',cjs.SiteCity + ',', 1) -1),''),NULLIF(LEFT(t.DeliveryCity, CHARINDEX(',',t.DeliveryCity + ',', 1) -1),''), NULLIF(LEFT(pf.STORE_CITY, CHARINDEX(',',pf.STORE_CITY + ',', 1) -1),'')) AS DeliveryCity
, COALESCE(LEFT(TRIM(NULLIF(RIGHT(cjs.SiteCity, NULLIF(CHARINDEX(',',REVERSE(cjs.SiteCity)),'') -1),'')),2),LEFT(TRIM(NULLIF(RIGHT(t.DeliveryCity, NULLIF(CHARINDEX(',',REVERSE(t.DeliveryCity)),'') -1),'')),2) , LEFT(TRIM(NULLIF(RIGHT(pf.STORE_CITY, NULLIF(CHARINDEX(',',REVERSE(pf.STORE_CITY)),'') -1),'')),2)) AS DeliveryState
, COALESCE(NULLIF(cjs.SiteZip,''), NULLIF(t.DeliveryZip,''), NULLIF(pf.STORE_ZIP,'')) AS DeliveryPostalCode
, t.ContactPhone
, s.[Name] AS ContractSalesRep
, s2.[Name] AS CustomerSalesRep
, o.OPNM AS CreatedOperatorName
, o2.OPNM AS AssignedOperatorName
, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AS LastLoadDate
FROM POR.dbo.Transactions t
JOIN (SELECT t0.CNTR, t0.[DATE] AS OriginalContractDate FROM POR.dbo.Transactions t0 WHERE RIGHT(t0.CNTR,1) NOT LIKE '[A-Za-z]%') t1
ON t1.CNTR = CASE WHEN RIGHT(t.CNTR,1) LIKE '[A-Za-z]%' THEN LEFT(t.CNTR, LEN(t.CNTR)-1) ELSE t.CNTR END
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.TransactionItems ti ON ti.CNTR = t.CNTR
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ItemFile ifi ON ifi.NUM = ti.ITEM
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ItemCategory ic ON ic.Category = ifi.Category
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerJobSite cjs ON cjs.Number = t.JobSite
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.ParameterFile pf ON pf.Store = t.[STR]
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.PaymentMethod pm ON pm.PayMeth = t.PYMT
LEFT JOIN (SELECT ipd.ItemNumber ,sum((ipd.QuantityPurchased - ipd.QuantitySold) * (ipd.PriceEach + ipd.ExtraCharges)) AS OEC, SUM(ipd.PriceEach + ipd.ExtraCharges) AS [BriggsPURP_PlusExtraCharges]
			FROM POR.dbo.ItemPurchaseDetail ipd
			WHERE ipd.Disposed = 0
			GROUP BY ipd.ItemNumber) AS oec ON ifi.[NUM] = oec.ItemNumber
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.CustomerFile cf ON cf.CNUM = t.CUSN
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.Salesman s ON s.Number = t.Salesman
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.Salesman s2 ON s2.Number = cf.Salesman -- Example CNTR 103071 See GUI. Trans SM is Misha Tufkova, but Customer assigned SM is Daniel Lee
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.OperatorId o ON o.OPNO = t.OperatorCreated
LEFT JOIN POR.dbo.OperatorId o2 ON o2.OPNO = t.OperatorAssigned;
